channel.title: GitHub Elixir Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Elixir in GitHub

item.title: plausible/analytics
item.description: Simple, open source, lightweight (< 1 KB) and privacy-friendly web analytics alternative to Google Analytics.

item.title: livebook-dev/livebook
item.description: Automate code & data workflows with interactive Elixir notebooks

item.title: elixir-lsp/elixir-ls
item.description: A frontend-independent IDE "smartness" server for Elixir. Implements the "Language Server Protocol" standard and provides debugger support via the "Debug Adapter Protocol"

item.title: elixir-lsp/elixir_sense
item.description: Provides context-aware information for code completion, documentation, go/jump to definition, signature info and more

item.title: phoenixframework/phoenix_live_view
item.description: Rich, real-time user experiences with server-rendered HTML

item.title: ntrepid8/ex_crypto
item.description: Wrapper around the Erlang crypto module for Elixir.

item.title: supabase/realtime
item.description: Broadcast, Presence, and Postgres Changes via WebSockets

item.title: phoenixframework/phoenix
item.description: Peace of mind from prototype to production

item.title: blockscout/blockscout
item.description: Blockchain explorer for Ethereum based network and a tool for inspecting and analyzing EVM based blockchains.

item.title: elixir-lang/elixir
item.description: Elixir is a dynamic, functional language for building scalable and maintainable applications

item.title: valpackett/httpotion
item.description: [Deprecated because ibrowse is not maintained] HTTP client for Elixir (use Tesla please)

item.title: elixir-ecto/ecto
item.description: A toolkit for data mapping and language integrated query.
